title: NinjaTurtle_AI
author: NinjaTurtle_AI
created_time: May 28, 2023, 06:46:56 PMLast edit: June 11, 2023, 01:08:32 AM by NinjaTurtle_AI
content: WEBSITE  TWITTER  TELEGRAM  TELEGRAM ANN  DISCORD  GITHUB  The NinjaTurtle is just here to commemorate the King of the meme, Pepe, and bring on the Turtle Renaissance. The next most memeable coin ever, Ninja Turtle. Since the turn of the new memellenium in crypto, there has been a new king called the Pepe. The OGs had Shiba but this is the time for new generation memers. Ninja Turtle will be leveraging the large meme community to become the next big push toward the meme future. In the long run, Ninja Turtle aims to become the best reflector of Pepe out there. Come On You FROGGERS! NinjaTurtle IDO Whitelist Live: Click Below Image For Link Bounty DetailsDear Bounty Hunters, The Ninja Turtle bounty program has been launched. In order to reward NinjaTurtle supporters $8000 BUSD will be allocated to the Bounty Pool.   Bounty Related All Questions: Here Week 1 (28 May - 03 Jun)  Week 2 (04 Jun - 10 Jun)  Week 3 (11 Jun - 17 Jun)  Bounty reward will be divided below sections, ✅ Number -1 : Twitter campaign (30%)✅ Number -2 : Telegram Campaign (30%)✅ Number -3 : Video Campaign (20%)✅ Number -4 : Meme+Tiktok Campaign (20%)Mandatory Rules◐Must join our Telegram group;◐Must join  Telegram channel;◐Must follow us on Twitter;◐Do not use multiple Accounts and Do not use a Neg trust account;◐Newbies are welcome for all campaigns;◐Do not request to change wallet address without hacked issue;◐We reserve the right to remove you from our campaign without explaining why we removed you;◐The team can decide anything to increase/decrease rewards depending on the participants,◐Each Week will end Monday at 23:59 (Forum Time)All Campaign Application Form■Post a reply before join any campaign■Code:[b]✔️PROOF OF JOINING✔️Forum Username: Telegram username: Campaign you joined: Wallet address: [/b]Twitter Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Telegram Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Video Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERE Meme+Tiktok Campaign Apply :  CLICK HERERules of Twitter Campaign:Follow our official Twitter page;Minimum 500 followers need to join this campaign;Must Retweet & likes 5 posts every week from our official page;Make 2 posts every week with #NinjaTurtle #turtle #Pepe #eth #meme #bnb;Your profile must be public, Otherwise, you will be removed;Your Twitter account must be old 1 month;➡500- 999 Followers: 2 Stakes per week;➡1000-5000 Followers: 5 Stakes per week;➡5001-10000 Followers: 10 Stakes per week;➡10000+ Followers: 20 Stakes per week;Rules of Telegram Campaign:Must join our Telegram group If you do not join our group you will get 0 stakes;Add our AVATAR and name ( "Your Name | Ninja Turtle Army" ) - Mandatory;Positive message in Ninja Turtle Group 2 times every week;Post minimum 4 positive messages about Ninja Turtle to other Crypto Telegram groups;Do not spam into the telegram group, Do not use any hashtags;Do not use slag language in the telegram group;Submit your message link End of the week Telegram Rewards➡6 Stakes every week Rules of Video Campaign:Minimum 100 Subscribers need to join our campaignSubscriber must be public;Video minimum length 2 minutes;You must have at least 100 views before being accepted;Your title must include the word. And Use hashtag #NinjaTurtle #turtle #Pepe #eth #meme #bnb;Video quality will be good;You can use any language & Be sure it will noise-free. Bot/Robotic Voice not allowed;In the video Description must add Our Website, Bitcointalk thread, Twitter link, Instagram Link and also Telegram link;Maximum 4 videos will accept for one person;You will add your Bitcointalk username, Email address in Video DescriptionYoutube Video Rewards➡Good Quality: 1 Stakes;➡Better Quality: 2 Stakes;➡Best Quality: 3 StakesSubscriber- 500-5000 (Extra 1 stake)5001-10000 (Extra 2 stakes)10000+ (Extra 3 stakes)Rules of Meme & Tiktok Campaign:Must join our Telegram group If you do not join our group you will get 0 stakes;The meme must be posted on Twitter, TikTok or any social media with a large following;Your Social platform must have at least 100 followers;Maximum of 5 memes/tiktok per person;Add hashtag #ninjaturtle #turtle #Pepe #meme #bnb #eth;Submit your message link End of the week Meme/Tiktok Campaign Rewards➡6 Stakes every week  MASTER SPREADSHEET
